mdRecord.dcterms:title: "The Origin of Species" and etc; 02 of 03
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 33-74, cloth sleeve"The Truth About Darwinism"; Reoccurring section of a periodical for BENA (British Empire Naturalist Association), where an ongoing discussion of multiple aspects of Darwinism is addressed by experts who write-in, along with editor comments. Select pages pulled for Faulds's notes. Included articles in this batch: "The Origin of Species" by H. W. D. Holder, "Lord Avebury and the Cuckoo Pint" by F. C. Witcombe, and "The Beauty of Insects" by Charles Heel.; E. Kay Robinson (E. K. R.), ed., London, p. 264-266, Country-Side; 3 pages; DF n.a.
